row.process: ! Check if a protocol has been specified (http, ssh etc) : DEFINE &UC4RB_GIT_URI_PARTS#, string, 2 : FILL &UC4RB_GIT_URI_PARTS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_GIT_URI#, "://") : SET &UC4RB_GIT_PROTOCOL# = &UC4RB_GIT_URI_PARTS#[1] : SET &UC4RB_GIT_URI_BODY# = &UC4RB_GIT_URI_PARTS#[2] : IF &UC4RB_GIT_URI_BODY# <> "" ! Inject credentials into command : IF &UC4RB_GIT_USERNAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_GIT_CMD# = '&UC4RB_GIT_CMD# &UC4RB_GIT_PROTOCOL#://&UC4RB_GIT_USERNAME#' : IF &UC4RB_GIT_PASSWORD# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_GIT_CMD# = '&UC4RB_GIT_CMD#:&UC4RB_GIT_PASSWORD#@&UC4RB_GIT_URI_BODY#' : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_GIT_CMD# = '&UC4RB_GIT_CMD#@&UC4RB_GIT_URI_BODY#' : ENDIF : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_GIT_CMD# = '&UC4RB_GIT_CMD# &UC4RB_GIT_URI#' : ENDIF : ELSE ! url with git but no ssh : SET &UC4RB_GIT_CMD# = '&UC4RB_GIT_CMD# &UC4RB_GIT_URI#' : ENDIF
